original_title: 비욘드 라이브 더 무비 : 엑소의 사다리 타고 세계여행3
overview: To celebrate the 10th anniversary of their debut, EXO members have traveled to Namhae, a treasure island with clean nature! The unpredictable ladder game that happens at any time and place, and the chemistry of EXO members who gathered after a long time! EXO's real trip in Namhae, Gyeongsangnam-do!
title: Beyond Live: EXO's Travel the World on a Ladder
